latest_meeting.summary: Parents prioritized trauma-informed caregiver training and flagged need for more Spanish-language onboarding.
actions: Launch weekend training stipend for caregivers completing trauma-informed coursework.
Add bilingual intake flow to the VC wallet app by next cycle.
Pilot mentorship pairs between veteran and new parents.

top_requests: Bulk purchase of diapers and snacks
Shared legal review for updated municipal compliance
Expanded access to substitute caregiver pool
